entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 23 February 2023
